```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```

```{r}
ems_data =
  read_csv(file = "./data/Incidents_Responded_to_by_Fire_Companies.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(incident_type_desc == "300 - Rescue, EMS incident, other")
  separate(incident_date_time, into = c("month", "day", "year"), sep = "/")

medical_ems_data = 
  ems_data %>% 
  count(incident_type_desc) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))

temp <- ems_data %>% mutate(year = substr(incident_date_time,7,10))

temp <- temp %>% filter(year == 2017) %>% count(incident_type_desc) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))


```
